tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited the Ethos Dental clinic for tooth ache. I was overwhelmed to see a clinic maintained hygiene with good ambience from the staff. Coming to the treatment, Dr Pradeep Raj gave a clear explanation about the dental issue and suggested to have a root canal treatment. I felt the charges provided by them are reasonable and affordable for the high quality services they have provided to me.  After treatment, I never had an experience that Clinic staff giving calls to the patients with regards to  post treatment care and I am happy about it.

I would like convey thanks to Dr Pradeep Raj sir and his entire team  for taking utmost care and extended support for  pre & post treatment.

I got to know from the Doctor that they have recently extended their services for Skin & Hair clinic. I met Dr Vasavi and had  Laser hair removal session and Hydra Facial treatment. 

I want stress few points with regards to the services.

Utmost care
Hight quality
Well maintainence
Procedure explained in detail 

I took laser treatment 2 years ago with a different clinic  but l could see there is a lot of difference with the quality of service provided in Ethos and the prices are reasonable.
reply_text: Thanks for lot for your valuable feedback.

tags: None
review:
I‚Äôve had a lot of dental work* *** *** ******* ** ** *** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** He takes his time, explains everything, and is so kind and gentle.‚Äù

He don‚Äôt try to get you to do unnecessary procedures (which can be rare in dentists) which helps keep them in my budget. Glad I found Him!‚Äù

tags: Value for money,
review: I feel the charges are more. Even though fee is relatively reasonable, 300/- per tooth x-ray is too much. He charged 900 for x-ray (3 teeth). Also the charges for root canal are almost double than what I paid elsewhere. This is my personal opinion. If you are Ok with paying more..you can go.
reply_text:
Thank you for visiting Ethos Dental. Sorry for the dissapointment regarding the finances. At Ethos Dental, we are following Covid 19 preventive measures such as disposable instruments, biomedical waste & Sterilization protocols strictly & it‚Äôs a complete Speciality practice. It's our protocol to explain the treatment procedure, time taken, instructions & charges prior to starting of the treatment. We have Vatech RVG for the X -ray. All the necessary information were given to the patient priorly in the above scenario. Finally, not just value for money but utmost patient care & satisfaction is our motto at Ethos Dental.

Regards, 
Ethos Dental

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,

He was so approachable and took extra care at every step to treat me for root canal, especially in this lockdown time. Phenoninal experience!!! I will recommend him to anyone for all dental procedures. Best experience ever.

Doctors called me regularly to check with my issue. At the clinic too, doctors are cordial to patients and make us feel like home.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have taken RCT treatment at Ethos Dental Clinic recently, Dr.Pradeep and his staff were professional,friendly and polite.The entire process and cap placement was finished within a span of 7days. Personally, I am quite happy with the experience since the procedures were painless.I would recommend Ethos for any kind of dental treatments and procedures. Thank you Doctors.

tags: Wait time,
review:
The doctor only consults, however the procedure is conducted by his assistants and/or other doctors. The procedure itself was well done, however there seems to be some amount of gossip that goes on among the assistants always giving me the feeling that the costs were too high for my procedure. Basically, I am not Telugu speaking and there was a lot of conversation in Telugu.  They were very friendly although, and the procedure was alright. 

I would say that there should be a process to explain the costs for a treatment as well. Makes you feel more confident and helps you recommend the place to friends and family.
reply_text:
Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We apologize for any discomfort you may have felt regarding the treatment charges and the assistants behaviour. We assure you that we take such concerns very seriously and are committed to providing the highest level of care to our patients.

Regarding the treatment charges, we understand that healthcare costs can be overwhelming, and we strive to provide transparent pricing information to our patients. We would be happy to discuss any questions or concerns you may have about your billing statement and provide you with a detailed explanation of the charges.

As for the assistants and other doctors behavior, we apologize for any perception of gossiping or unprofessionalism. We take pride in our team's ethical standards and their dedication to providing exceptional care to our patients. We will explore your concerns and take appropriate actions to ensure that our staff upholds our values and our patients' trust.

We value your feedback and appreciate the opportunity to improve our services. Please feel free to contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.

Regards 
Ethos Dental
